short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin enables the loading of any website in an iframe on the Taskmonk application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin helps to enable any webpage in a Taskmonk iframe. Normally several webpages are blocked from being rendered in an iFrame of another website. But this plugin adds the required header to load the webpages in an iFrame of your desired site. Useful if you are trying to compare two different websites in a single application.
